parameters: I am merely "playing dead" as they call it, to save myself
while you go about defeating this... baddie!

What is that supposed to mean?
We heard you might have a tool for us.
What are you two on about?\.
I am a mere bard-turned-alchemist. My barding skills
are... well, they leave a bit to be desired according
So I dabbled in the arts of alchemy when I heard one
of my patrons at the bar talking about it in a drunken
They said "I can be rich if I can just perfect this
damn \C[31]Philosopher's Stone\C[0]!", and I knew I
needed that for myself. Times were rough. I don't even

Hmm, well that can't be right. \N[2], didn't you say this
Yup, this guy definitely has it. He has plot-progression

\N[1] steps forward and yanks the \C[6]ukelele\C[0] out of
Yeah but you said you don't even want it.\.
And after I show ya this, I think I'll just go ahead
Yep, I'm gonna go ahead and confiscate this.
\C[6]Tools\C[0] like this should not rest with random
side characters like you.\. Sorry pal.
I\..\..\.. never knew the ukelele had such power...
It was a gift from my original master who taught me
the ways of bardology. He did leave me with a note though,
one written in a language I've never seen before.
The note he left I keep at my cottage in the small village
outside of Erocian Kingdom proper: \C[1]Raevula\C[0]. Next time
you two are around, you are free to read it! Perhaps you
mysterious adventurers might recognize the language.
I have traveled a lot in my time, but clearly not as much
as you two have.\. Please.\. Keep it.\. Consider it a
gift for saving my life from that deadly slime.
Though I do wonder what the note says...
Well, maybe we should check it out?
But also, now that we have a \C[6]tool that can destroy
those grey spires\C[0], that most definitely will let us
go to some new places- including the cliffs part of the cliffs,
not some \C[15]dank ass basin\C[0] like this.
The real question is: which path are we gonna take back?
On this lowest level, there were \C[1]two paths\C[0] going
up, the one we came from, and another one that
looked like it ran up the small spire we saw glimpses of
in the middle of this basin.
but the \C[1]route we came from had a bunch of treasure
and rooms locked behind \C[6]grey spires\C[1] that we can
Oh, looks like some helpless pleb is being attacked by a
When we are fighting for others' lives, we sure are lazy
Yeah, I mean its just a slime, \N[2]. If he dies to the

That may be true, but I don't see any tool around, so I
wager that since this is a miniboss fight, that the guy

Yeah yeah yeah, alright, lets go smack the slime and
